LanguageData.Proj_GrenadeBottlecap.label: Mine Lid
LanguageData.Weapon_Grenade_Bottlecap.label: Lid-Mine
LanguageData.Weapon_Grenade_Bottlecap.description: A popular pre-war Vault-Tec lunchbox has become the basis for a deadly mine in the post-apocalyptic Commonwealth. This homemade device will help you deal with any enemy.
LanguageData.Weapon_Grenade_Bottlecap.verbs.0.label: Throws a Lid Mine
